data.persona: I am the mud that sticks on the floor. I am the clump that rolls down the hill. I am the grains that line the shore, and where you'll rest when your heart lays still.
data.description:
You are in the Firewood Forest.
The forest has many trees. The majority of the trees are green however a few are orange and red. The forest is huge and seems to never end.
There's a tree and a wood is gathered to make fire here.
The well off business man is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I have to kill the business man
data.mid_motivation: I need to bury his body
data.long_motivation: I need to enrich the soil of the forest and keep it producing
